Open 'https://www.ecomsite.com/item/P001'
Verify the main product image has source 'product_P001_hero.webp', rendered dimensions 800x600px, and alt text 'Premium Widget'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is enabled, visible at x 950, y 700, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, text size 16px, border radius 4px, and a width of 180px
Verify the product title displays 'Deluxe Smart Widget' with typeface 'Arial', type weight 700, text alignment center, and a margin bottom of 20px
Navigate to 'https://www.app.com/signup'

Verify the 'Username' input field is visible, has placeholder text 'Enter your username', inner spacing 10px, border 1px solid #ccc, becomes focused on click, and its current content is initially empty
Type 'testuser' into the 'Username' input field
Verify the 'Username' input's text color changes to #333333, its width becomes 250px, and it has an accessibility label 'Username input field'
Verify the 'Email' input is initially disabled
Open 'https://www.website.org/'
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is displayed, has type size 14px, font style 'Open Sans', color #333333, and a padding of 15px 20px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link on hover background color transitions to #f0f0f0 over 200ms and its text color changes to #000000
Verify the entire navigation bar is positioned at top 0, left 0, and has a height of 60px
Click 'Delete Account'

Verify a modal dialog becomes visible with an opacity of 1, positioned at horizontal position 50%, vertical position 50% relative to the viewport, and its background overlay is rgba(0,0,0,0.6) covering the full viewport
Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' button inside the modal has text color #ffffff, background #dc3545, text size 15px, corner radius 5px, and aria-label 'Confirm account deletion'
Open 'https://media.stream.com/player/ID123'
Play the video
Verify the video player controls are visible initially, the video is not muted, and the 'Fullscreen' button is enabled
Click the 'Fullscreen' button
Verify the video expands to cover the entire screen, and the 'Fullscreen' button's background changes to #333333 when active
Verify the video source is 'video_stream_ID123.mp4' and its natural dimensions are 1920x1080px
Open 'https://admin.portal/orders'
Verify the order list table displays exactly 10 rows, with each row having a height of 40px and a border bottom 1px solid #eee
Verify the 'Order ID' column header has font weight 600 and text align left
Verify the 'Status' column in the first 3 rows displays 'Processing' and these rows have a background color of #fffbe6
Verify the 'Status' column in the remaining 7 rows displays 'Shipped'
Open 'https://support.kb.com/faq'
Click the 'How to reset password?' accordion header
Verify the content section expands with a height transition of 300ms, showing text 'Access your account settings...' and a padding of 20px
Verify the header's background color changes from #f8f8f8 to #e0e0e0 when active, and its font weight changes to 700
Verify the content section has a border left 4px solid #007bff
Open 'https://www.corporate.com/'
Verify the hero section background image has source 'hero_background.jpg' and is loaded within 500ms
Verify the 'Explore Services' button is visible, has text color #ffffff, background #28a745, text size 18px, padding 15px 30px, alignment center within the hero section, and a border radius of 8px
Click the 'Language' dropdown button
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned directly below the button, with an opacity of 1 and a z-index of 1000
Verify the menu items have an inner spacing of 10px 15px and type size 14px
Verify the 'English' option is initially selected with a background color of #e9ecef
Verify the menu has a border 1px solid #ced4da and a width of 150px
Open 'https://my.app.com/profile'
Verify the progress bar is displayed and shows 75% completion
Verify the filled portion has a width of 75% of its container, background color #28a745, and a border radius of 5px
Verify the accompanying text displays '75% Complete' with text size 13px, color #6c757d, text alignment center, and it has an aria-label 'Profile completion percentage'
Navigate to 'https://blog.info/articles'
Verify the pagination component is visible at the bottom of the article list
Verify there are 5 page number links displayed, with '1' being the active page indicated by background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify each page link has an outer spacing right 5px, padding 8px 12px, font size 14px, and a border 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled
Open 'https://www.company.com/'

Verify the 'Facebook' icon image in the footer has source 'facebook_icon.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, alt text 'Follow us on Facebook', padding 5px, margin right 10px, circular shape with border radius 50%, loads within 100ms, and aria-label 'Facebook profile link'
Scroll to the bottom of 'https://www.newsportal.net/'
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer is displayed, has text size 13px, color #6c757d, font family 'Helvetica', text alignment left, outer spacing top 10px, and padding left 5px
Verify the 'Contact Us' link is next to the 'Privacy Policy' link, shares the same font characteristics, and has an accessibility label 'Contact Information'
Open 'https://www.products.store/'
Locate the search input field
Verify the search input field is visible, has placeholder text 'Search for products...', border 1px solid #ced4da, width 300px, and aria-label 'Product search input'
Verify the adjacent 'Search' button is enabled, has background color #6c757d, text color #ffffff, and a padding of 10px 15px
Submit a form

Verify a 'Success' notification message appears at top right (x 80%, y 20px) of the viewport, is visible, has background color #d4edda, text color #155724, font size 15px, padding 15px, border radius 4px, and aria-label 'Form submission successful message'
Verify the 'Success' notification message transitions out of view with a fade animation over 500ms after 3 seconds
Click on an input field to open the date picker calendar
Verify the calendar grid is visible
Verify today's date '2023-10-27' is selected, indicated by background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Verify each date cell has a width of 30px, height of 30px, padding 5px, and a border radius of 3px
Verify the header displays the current month and year with font weight 600
Verify the previous/next month buttons are enabled
Open 'https://dashboard.admin/settings'
Click the 'Security' tab
Verify the 'Security' tab becomes active, indicated by a border bottom 2px solid #007bff, its font weight changes to 700, its text color is #007bff, and it has a padding of 10px 15px
Verify the corresponding 'Security Settings' content panel becomes visible, while other content panels are hidden
Verify the 'General' tab is no longer active
Browse to 'https://artgallery.co/collection/landscape'
Verify the first image in the gallery has source 'landscape_01.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x400px, loads within 2s, and alt text contains 'Panoramic view'
Verify scrolling down reveals additional images and the gallery container allows vertical scroll
Verify each thumbnail in the carousel has a width of 100px, height of 75px, and a margin right 10px
Open 'Notifications' settings page
Locate the 'Email Notifications' toggle switch
Verify the 'Email Notifications' toggle switch is initially disabled with a background color #e0e0e0, width 40px, height 24px, border radius 12px, and aria-label 'Toggle email notifications'
Click the 'Email Notifications' toggle switch
Verify the 'Email Notifications' toggle switch changes its state to enabled, background color to #28a745, and the inner circle (thumb) moves right with a transition duration of 200ms
Hover over the 'Info' icon next to 'Subscription Tier'

Verify a tooltip becomes visible after 300ms, positioned 10px below the icon at horizontal position 500, vertical position 300, with an opacity of 1, background color #333333, text color #ffffff, text size 12px, padding 8px 12px, displays the text 'Your current plan features', and has a border radius of 4px
